colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (ZHES PA 'DI YANG SNGA PHYIR DON GNYER CAN MANG POS YANG YANG BSKUL MA BYUNG ZHING NYE CHAR DANG LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RDO RJES RGYUN DU NYAMS LEN BYA PHYIR ZA BYED RDO RJE MKHA' 'GRO'I SBYIN SREG BYA TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I SNYAN RGYUD 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIM CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS KUN TU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
